name: HooksBattleRoyale
description:
A battle royale with the best mechanic ever.

Just trying to make something online in unreal

We achived 14 simultaneus people playing and it kinda works :O

How to play:

This game only works on LAN. First player press play and automaticaly creates the server, then the others player can join pressing play

ASDW to move, Space to jump, Left clic or Q to use the hook

Enter to start the "real" game (is mostly broken)

When someone is hit with another hook or goes out of limits, gets eliminated. At the end the server wins cause the game doesnt work as it should

Made by: @MauVGames, @Lauk_uk and @irx99
